website_summaries.verdict: The TiVo Bolt makes a strong claim to the throne as king of DVRs and streaming media, but those pesky TiVo service fees keep it short of perfection.
pros: The TiVo Bolt combines a best-in-class DVR experience with a streaming media box
it has the capability to stream and download recorded content to iOS and Android devices
and easy expansion to other rooms with TiVo Mini extenders
skip commercials on primetime TV recordings with a single button press
cons: The still-required monthly or "lifetime" service fees raise the total cost of ownership
though the app selection is very good, you still may need another streaming-media box to fill in the gaps
doesn't work with satellite or AT&T U-verse

customer_reviews.title: signals verified as good on two separate visits
customer_reviews.text: If you buy from Amazon and have to return the unit for replacement, after 30 days you will get to pay $50 to exchange it. Only buy Tivo's from Tivo apparently. Unit will not get signal on Tuners 2 and 3 and the local cable company has replaced everything between the pole and the Tivo in the 11 visits to the house, signals verified as good on two separate visits. 5 calls to Tivo with no other option than to swap the unit for 50 bucks and hope it fixes it.
customer_reviews.author: justplayvideogames

customer_reviews.title: TiVo saves $ without any sense of loss
customer_reviews.text: We are really enjoying our TiVo System. I go the TiVo Bolt and 3 TiVo Minis to create a 4-TV, whole-home recording and streaming experience. My TV antenna installer was so impressed with me and our new system! TiVo lets us watch and record from all the major networks in High Definition through my antenna PLUS allows us to stream and record from Amazon, Netflix, Hulu, Vudu, YouTube and MORE. And I get all this without the need for a cable or satellite subscription. And the picture is Amazing! Thank you, TiVo, for allowing me to "cut the cord", saving me over $1500 a year, all without any sense of loss!
customer_reviews.author: JoBeth Gerrard

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: The seller is awesome, and much of the bolts functionality is awesome. Particularly I love skipping commercials and its interaction with Netflix and Hulu. However it doesn't read all of the channels from my digital antenna so we do not have access to Fox or NBC, which we do if we plug the antenna directly into the TV. Also it is annoying that I cannot watch HBO now through TiVo. You can watch HBO Go, but the point of being on TiVo is to be cord free, and HBO GO is only available if you're paying for cable.
customer_reviews.author: azscram

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware with Buggy Software
customer_reviews.text: While the concept of a all in one media box is a great, there are too many software bugs to make reality. The streaming apps can crash (Amazon Instant mostly, sometimes netflix), requiring a reboot, which will mess up any recordings in progress. I have yet to get it to to reliably download shows to android or iOS devices, which I was able to do that easily on older Tivo. Even the initial setup did not work, it took several software updates to even get the cable to work. The box is faster, better resolution, and much smaller/cooler, but unless they get the software bulletproof, still can not act as the all in one promised.
customer_reviews.author: Jon-Paul Leduc

customer_reviews.title: The best Tivo yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Tivo made in my book. I've only had it a week, but I can't do without it now. The commercial skip works perfectly, although not all shows will support this. Hoping for more support in the coming weeks. Getting it setup with your cable company can be a pain, but if you can go to DSLreports website and get a tech from your cable company to help, it will be a flawless setup. It's super quick, great interface, has a year's worth of programming guide and service included. The 4k on Amazon looks amazing and works great with a 4K Vizio tv. Can't wait for more streaming apps to be added to this device.
customer_reviews.author: Terence Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Tivo We LOVE you!
customer_reviews.text: Why pay your cable or satellite provider the rental fees on their garbage DVR's when you can have the REAL thing with Tivo Bolt! This is the one that we have been wanting for a while and finally could do it, and we haven't been disappointed at all! Our only gripe is that Time Warner and Tivo apparently won't play in the sandbox well together - Time Warner won't allow Tivo's to connect to their on demand library, which is annoying and another reason to hate Time Warner. But that's fully a Time Warner issue - not a Tivo issue.
customer_reviews.author: Perry J.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the tivo bolt, and just need a small fix to the streaming interface
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tivo Bolt and really enjoy how easy it is to set up and record my favorite shows. I wish the streaming interface with Amazon and Netflix worked a little better, which is why I only gave it 4 stars. On my other devices, when I watch a series on Amazon or Netflix the device creates a placeholder for the next episode. This way I don't have to remember where I left off. If Tivo could incorporate this functionality it would be nearly perfect.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Duke

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good But Not Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent unit overall, would likely have given this 5 stars but for the lack of DLNA support. DLNA is so fundamental I cannot understand why it was not built into this unit. I do appreciate the strong support for Amazon, Netflix and HBOGO. Still it lacks support for other premiums like ShowTime Anytime and others. The performance is pretty decent and it's compact. The ability to use it as a MOCA network source is a huge plus. Buy a bolt, some mini's and use your existing cable connections in the house to get Tivo everywhere. All in all close but not a 5 star act yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dave - West Michigan

customer_reviews.title: We Love Our TiVo
customer_reviews.text: We love our TiVo Bolt. Not only are we able to receive the national channels OTA (Over TheAir) antenna that we usually watch, but we are able to record those shows on our TiVo and are saving over $100 per month that we were paying for satellite TV. We love the skip feature and the ability to record 4 shows at a time. I just installed a TiVo Mini in our bedroom and can now watch live TV and any of the shows that we recorded from our TiVo Bolt DVR.
customer_reviews.author: rp1862

customer_reviews.title: Beats sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: Best thing since sliced bread. It feels more personal than the cable box I had before. Besides the 4 show at once recording, commercial skip button, and variable parameter recording option, I really like to have Netflix and Amazon Prime streaming readily available instead of having to use my Roku box as before. This Tivo is super easy to use and intuitive in the menu selections. It's got lots of bells and whistles like 4K UHD compatibility and 1TB memory that I haven't touched yet.
customer_reviews.author: John Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement over former TIVO
customer_reviews.text: Big improvement over my other TIVO, which I used for OTA recordings. Now, with cable-card enabled, I have dropped my cable set-top box and DVR for net cable saving. New TIVO is a snap to use, especially the commercial skip. Video and audio are flawless, and I have started using Netflix and Amazon streaming for selected shows, and they come in with usually good video/audio, though I have had some bandwidth problems causing pauses and dropouts. This little box is a technical wonder.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Pearlston

customer_reviews.title: If you guys could work out something with SlingTV that would be amazing! 3
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the answer to just about all of my media consumption dreams! The OnePass and search features are well ahead of what Roku and AppleTV have. The only things that are missing from allowing me to unplug those two boxes are: 1. Hulu, which I hope comes soon since it's on my TiVO mini 2. If you guys could work out something with SlingTV that would be amazing! 3. Some way to be an AirPlay/ChromeCast end point. Your interface is absolutely elegant which is where so many things I have tried have fallen short. Sure, I can hack together a Kodi box to do just about anything but it was a constant maintenance nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dwyer

Some info on when it will happen would at least be nice. Also multiple streams needs to be made available.

customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in the appearance of the device. This was supposedly designed to look good on my media cabinet but it looks like a 2 year old assembled it. Parts totally misaligned. Not blown away by the performance either. I don't get many channels I would get with my cable provider's box including on-demand. Too bad I can't get satellite where my apartment is located.

customer_reviews.title: Paid Up Service Plan does not transfer from old Tivo to new Tivo!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Tivo premier for which I had paid in advance for one year of service and have 7 months left...Tivo would not refund the 7 months or credit it toward my new bolt. So essentially Tivo penalizes you for not waiting to upgrade your box until your current paid service runs out! I've had good service from Tivo for the past 11 years until now, so am really disappointed that they treat loyal customers this way. I would have expected they would at least credit my paid up time to the bolt.
customer_reviews.author: R. Norris

customer_reviews.title: TiVo BOLT is great, but Amazon prime video support for it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: To quote the Amazon help desk, "I am sorry but right now this device is not compatible with the Amazon right now. We are working on this and I assure that this device will be there in future." Don't waste hours like I did trying to register your TiVo BOLT with Amazon. The web screen to enter the code freezes, with no error message to tell you what's wrong, no matter how many times you try. The TiVo BOLT is fine, but the Amazon prime video support isn't there.
customer_reviews.author: retired California lady
